title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 300.4 - Interest rate on loans to tier 1 and 2 members
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 300.4 - Interest rate on loans to tier 1 and 2 members

State Regulations
(a) The rate of interest to be charged on all
loans granted on and after April 1, 1970 pursuant to sections
50
and
350
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law shall be five per centum per annum. (b) This rate of interest shall also apply, from April 1, 1970, to unpaid balances of loans outstanding on such
date. (c) The rate of interest
fixed herein shall remain in effect until revised by further order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
300.4

Amended, New

York State Register January 29, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 4, eff. 1/29/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
